mapper.insert: INSERT INTO files (albumsNo, content, year, month, day, star, filePath) VALUES (#{albumsNo}, #{content}, #{year}, #{month}, #{day}, #{star}, #{filePath})
mapper.select: SELECT f.fileNo, f.albumsNo, f.content, f.year, f.month, f.day, f.star, f.filePath FROM files f INNER JOIN albums a ON f.albumsNo = a.albumsNo WHERE a.albumsNo = #{albumsNo} ORDER BY f.fileNo ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT f.fileNo, f.albumsNo, f.content, f.year, f.month, f.day, f.star, f.filePath FROM files f INNER JOIN albums a ON f.albumsNo = a.albumsNo WHERE a.albumsNo = #{albumsNo} AND f.year = #{year} AND f.month = #{month} AND f.day = #{day} ORDER BY f.fileNo ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT f.fileNo, f.albumsNo, f.content, f.year, f.month, f.day, f.star, f.filePath FROM files f INNER JOIN albums a ON f.albumsNo = a.albumsNo WHERE a.albumsNo = #{albumsNo} AND f.star = 1 ORDER BY f.year ASC, f.month ASC, f.day ASC, f.fileNo ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM files f INNER JOIN albums a ON f.albumsNo = a.albumsNo WHERE a.albumsNo = #{albumsNo}

SELECT u.userNo, u.name, a.albumsNo, a.title, f.fileNo, f.content, f.year, f.month, f.day, f.star, f.filePath FROM users u JOIN albums a ON u.userNo = a.userNo JOIN files f ON a.albumsNo = f.albumsNo WHERE u.userNo = #{userNo} ORDER BY f.year ASC, f.month ASC, f.day ASC, f.fileNo ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM files f INNER JOIN albums a ON f.albumsNo = a.albumsNo INNER JOIN users u ON a.userNo = u.userNo WHERE u.userNo = #{userNo}
SELECT fileNo, albumsNo, content, year, month, day, star, filePath FROM files WHERE fileNo = #{fileNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE files SET content = COALESCE(#{content}, content), year = COALESCE(#{year}, year), month = COALESCE(#{month}, month), day = COALESCE(#{day}, day) WHERE fileNo = #{fileNo}
